configuration.stem: Weather forecast models have advantages and drawbacks. For example, one model may predict rain in a region with more accuracy than another model. Explain how the accuracy of a weather forecast model is tested.
configuration.teacherAnswer: Answers should include specific tests of weather forecast certainty. Sample answer: Forecasts are tested by comparing the predictions to what actually happens with the weather. Over time, one may notice patterns and be able to adjust the equations used in the model to make more accurate predictions.
